Room.Name: Ministry Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Ministry Way, west of the Oceancrest Ministries.
Room.LongDescription: The North Oceancrest Ministries are located to the east, and include the Ministry to Tranquility, the Hall of Discipline and the Ministry of Rumor Control. To the west, you can see a small shop called Iilian's Potions, where various potions and other strange stuff may be purchased.
